title: Manufacturers' Shipments, Nondurable Goods Industries, Total for United States
notes:
Data Were Adjusted For Trading-Day And Calendar Month Variations. Revisions For 1961-1970 May Be Found In Census Bureau Series M3-1.2. Source: U.S. Bureau Of The Census, Data For 1947-1960: "Manufacturers' Shipments, Inventories, And Orders: 1947-1963", Revised, Series M3-1, Published October 1963; Data For 1961-1965: "Business Statistics, 1965 Biennial Edition"

This NBER data series m06119 appears on the NBER website in Chapter 6 at http://www.nber.org/databases/macrohistory/contents/chapter06.html.

NBER Indicator: m06119
